user.title: Connect to Karakeep
user.description: Configure connection to your Karakeep instance

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Karakeep server. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication token. Please check your API token and try again.
error.invalid_url: The provided URL is invalid. Please enter a valid Karakeep API URL.
error.invalid_url_format: The URL format is invalid. Please ensure it includes the protocol (http:// or https://) and domain.
error.timeout_error: Connection to the Karakeep server timed out. Please try again later.
error.client_error: An error occurred while communicating with the Karakeep API. Please try again.
error.invalid_api_path: The API path is invalid. Please check your URL configuration.
error.api_error: The Karakeep API returned an error. Please check your configuration.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

abort.no_existing_config: No existing Karakeep configuration found to reconfigure
